1370: Poppo was born in Kerckstraet in 1370.
Got married to Imma at age 26 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Imma, Mette, at age 26.
1371: Had a daughter with Imma, Liudburgis, at age 27.
1373: Had a son with Imma, Havix, at age 29.
1374: Had a daughter with Imma, Ricmoden, at age 30.
1376: Had a daughter with Imma, Nimme, at age 32.
1377: Lost daughter Mette when Mette was 8 years old.
1384: Had a son with Imma, Jacob, at age 40.
1385: Lost daughter Gerburgis when Gerburgis was 0 years old.
Imma gave birth to their stillborn daughter Gerburgis in 1385.
